item.title: Customizing Chapter and Section Numbering in LaTeX
item.description: Code The LaTeX code \setcounter{section}{n} sets the current section number to $n$. Since this counter increases by 1 with each added section, the order of the section created next becomes $n+1$. \documentclass{book} \begin{document} \chapter{Limits and Derivatives} \section{Continuity} \end{document} \documentclass{book} \begin{document} \setcounter{chapter}{1} \chapter{Limits and Derivatives} \setcounter{section}{4} \section{Continuity} \end{document}
